text: John T. Chisholm (born in Milwaukee in 1963) is the district attorney of Milwaukee County, Wisconsin. He has held this office since 2007. Chisholm is known for his successful prosecution of corrupt politicians and police officers, serial killer Walter Ellis, crime boss and preacher Michael Lock, and many associates of Governor Scott Walker. ==References== Category:1963 births Category:Living people Category:People from Wisconsin Category:District attorneys
title: John T. Chisholm
